description:
Career success is no longer about chasing opportunites, it's about creating opportunities! Standing out in this market is going to require self-insight, personal accountability and proactive planning. You are going to have to learn to approach the job search like an entrepreneur!   

Based on his Amazon.com top selling job hunting book The YOU Plan, Dr. Woody will put you in his trademarked career “Hot Seat” and challenge you to answer five (5) fundamental questions designed to create your own YOU Plan for landing that next job or launching a new career:

  • What are your Values?
  • What are your Intrinsic Assets?
  • What are your Passions?
  • What is your Essence (or personal brand)?
  • What is your Roadmap for getting there?

This dynamic 2-hour self-paced course consists of video lectures, slides, worksheets, quick tips guides, published articles, and chapters from Dr. Woody's book The YOU Plan. You will leave the program with a personalized YOU Plan and detailed roadmap for getting out of the "Hot Seat" and making your career ambitions come true!
title: The YOU Plan for Career Change!
